required_data_to_create_ad: What data is required to create a ad?
name: Name
furnished_apartment_example: Furnished apartment near Palestine Polytechnic University
example_apartment_address: Example: Hebron - Wadi Al-Hurriya - Beside Abu Aisha Mosque
missing_data_message: Some fields are missing. Please fill in all fields and try again.
private_student_apartment: Private apartment for students in a quiet location away from noise. We offer student discounts and have various amenities like a supermarket, fast food restaurant, and libraries serving students of all specialties.
booking_no_account_required: Booking an Apartment Does Not Require an Account or Login
enter_number_with_country_code: Enter Your Number Starting with Country Code
payment_by_agreement: Payment is by agreement with the owner, typically in cash in the West Bank.
deposit_payment_agreement: Usually, owners agree to accept a deposit for securing the booking.
how_to_book_apartment: How Can I Book an Apartment?
booking_steps: Follow these steps to book an apartment
booking_cancellation: Can I Cancel an Apartment Booking?
shekel_per_month_note: This word appears under the image in each ad and means (Shekel/Month).
data_protection_policy: We are fully responsible for protecting your personal information. This policy explains how we use your personal data when you use our app on Android or iOS.
owner_info_usage: We use the owner's information as follows
phone_usage: Your phone number is used to contact you about inquiries or to address any unwanted activities.
owner_apartment_info_usage: Owner's apartment details help users understand the apartment better.
apartment_details: Apartment details include area (sqm), room count, and bathroom count.
owner_data_info: Owner Data includes the owner's name and phone number.
try_enabling_mobile_data_or_wifi: Try Enabling Mobile Data or Wi-Fi
example_of_location: Example of Location: Hebron - Wadi Al-Hurriya - Beside Abu Aisha Mosque
info_of_general_info: General information includes the advertisement title, meeting place, number of individuals or students allowed, category - male, female, families... - and monthly fee.
example_apartment_description: Any more details, such as whether the apartment is in a quiet area or in the city center, on which floor, is there a grocery store nearby, is transportation easy to get there... .
login_to_create_ad: Please log in to create your ad
login_to_add_apartment: Log in first to add your apartment
no_internet: You are not connected to the internet
required_data_for_ad: What data is required to post an ad?
navigate_to_homepage: Go to the main menu by tapping the home icon located at the bottom right of the interface.
step_two_details: Search for an apartment that suits you. You can select the category you want using the 'Category' button at the top right of the interface. The button appears by scrolling down and then up, or by tapping any item on the main screen.
tip_contact_owner: If you don’t find a suitable apartment, try contacting any owner with a Ad in the city where you're looking. They might be able to refer you to someone who has the apartment you need.
step_three_details: Tap the 'View More' button to see more details about the selected apartment.
step_four_details: In the inquiry box, choose your preferred contact method to reach out to the apartment owner.
step_five_contact_owner_to_book: Step 5: Contact the owner to book
step_five_details: Contact the apartment owner to get further details about the apartment and the booking process.
booking_duration_info: What is the available booking duration?
booking_duration_details: The booking duration depends on the number of months you choose when booking. The duration can also be agreed upon in advance between you and the owner.
apartment_advantages_details: These are the amenities, comforts, and other tools already available in the apartment. These advantages are currently available in the app, and you can add any additional advantages you want.
info_phone_usage_details: We also use the owner's phone number in case of any unwanted activities.
passwords_do_not_match: Old and new passwords cannot be the same
password_too_short: The new password is too short
phone_number_should_start_with_country_c: Phone Number should Starting with Country Code
please_entry_the_phone_number_field: please entry the phone number field
please_entry_the_password_field: please entry the phone number field
feedback_acknowledgement: Thank you for your feedback, it will be taken into account
agree_terms: By choosing to create an account, I agree to the Privacy Policy terms
enter_matching_passwords: Please enter matching passwords in both fields
unverified_phone: You have not verified your phone number
try_different_phone: The phone number is already in use
phone_valid_account_creation: The phone number is correct, please go back and complete creating a new account
identity_verification: Make sure it matches the name on your ID card
phoneOrPasswordIncorrect: The phone number or password is incorrect
the_phone_number_is_not_suitable: The phone number is not suitable
username_must_not_contain_special_charac: Username must not contain special characters
phone_number_must_not_contain_special_ch: phone number must not contain special characters
